Plot: This movie prompts racism. Bernie Mac's daughter brings her boyfriend home to meet her parents. He is not accepted and mistreated just because of the color of his skin.
Title: Guess Who
Writer: William Rose (motion picture "Guess Who's Coming to Dinner"), David Ronn (story), Jay Scherick (story), David Ronn (screenplay), Jay Scherick (screenplay), Peter Tolan (screenplay)
Actors: Bernie Mac, Ashton Kutcher, Zoe Saldana, Judith Scott
tomatoConsensus: Despite the chemistry of its stars, Guess Who, a loose remake of Guess Who's Coming to Dinner, lacks the political relevance of the original.
